content: Phase 1: POC - Setup Firebase credentials and install dependencies
Phase 1: POC - Create test_core.py with all POC tests (Firestore, sample data, scoring, clustering, LLM)
Phase 1: POC - Run test_core.py and fix until all tests pass
Phase 1: Verify all user stories are working in POC
Phase 2: Build complete frontend (React with all 5 routes)
Phase 2: End-to-End testing using testing agent
Phase 2: Fix all issues found in testing
Phase 2: All user stories covered in Development and testing
